Material used.Description: The experiment involved using HEK293 cells transfected with cDNA containing the missense variant.

Readout description.Result Description: DJ-1 protein expression was reduced by 30% in cells carrying the c.244G>A mutation.

Technical replicates.Description: Not described in the provided text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: An empty vector was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: N.D. - Not described in the provided text. Would require prior data or expert knowledge.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: A 30% reduction in DJ-1 expression, as described in the result.

Approved assay.Approved assay: N.D. - Need more information to determine if this is a standard assay for Parkinson's research.
